urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @shang_siaaa Hi, Shangy! For Mabuhay Miles  concerns, we suggest to directly process it through our mabuhay miles website: https://t.co/VzNyT4Zs21
@Wheniwasyoug @KLCreativeStd We sincerely apologize for the delay, Wicked-Game. Rest assured you be updated once we have news on your refund.
@DiksiDanda Hi, DDanda. For Mabuhay Miles concerns, you may have it checked by our @PALMabuhayMiles team :)
@itsusma60716890 Hello, itsusman. We are sorry to hear this. May we know if you were trying to book for a flight with an infant?
@baebaek0506 Hi, Baebaek0506! We've sent you a DM, for us too look into your booking. Kindly check :)
@affluxttv Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience, Afflux. We will request for a follow-up with the concerned office.
@harundenzz As checked, PR685 for August 3, 2022 got delayed due to operational requirements, Harun. Again, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.

@harundenzz Hi, Harun. We're truly sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. We are now checking with the concerned office regarding the reason of delay. Kindly wait for updates.
@OsamaArab6 Sent, Osama.
@OsamaArab6 Our apologies but we did not receive any response here, Osama. Kindly respond to our dm so we can have this checked.
@ahyindelacruz We've sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@OsamaArab6 Hi, Osama. Our apologies for the delay. We've sent you a dm to ask for your details. However, we did not receive any reply. Kindly check.

@ahyindelacruz Hi! May we know your desired flight route?
@atzeuli We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, Aaron. May we request if you could change your settings so we can send you a direct message?

@annniiieee09 (2/2) For inquiries or more information, you may directly coordinate with the Bureau of Quarantine at helpdeskboq@gmail.com.

Thank you for your cooperation.

@annniiieee09 (1/2) Hello, Anne. We are sorry to hear this. All information shared in the One Health Pass is collected and processed solely by the Bureau of Quarantine. The One Health Pass website is independent of PAL and PAL has no control over said website.
@patty_ll0 Hi, Patty. May we know more details about your concern? Thank you.

@shieramillanes However, certain restrictions may be imposed on other destinations. We suggest you directly contact the LGU of your destination to find out if they have certain policies in place. Thank you.

(4/4)

@shieramillanes For domestic stations, Philippine Airlines can check-in these items as long as adequate and proper packing is ensured to prevent leakage during transit. 

(3/4)

@shieramillanes Hi, Shiera. Most countries do not allow on bringing in seafood, meats, and other perishable items. Contact the destination country’s Bureau of Plant and Quarantine as well as Customs to know more about these regulations.

(1/4)
@GalenzogaClaire Thank you, Claire.

@jhonzalon This is noted. We sent you a message, Jhon. Thank you.

@sheenpot We're truly sorry to hear this, Shayne. We have tried sending you a dm but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check it so we can look into this.

@applemiffed Hi, 🌙 ☀️. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the delay of your flight. We assure you that we do not change our flight schedules if it was not deemed necessary. Please approach our airport representatives for assistance. Thank you.

@Gladys37101435 We are sorry for the inconvenience, Gladys. We replied to your message. Kindly check your inbox.
